headline: IDEX’s Q4 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: IDEX’s fourth quarter was marked by a positive market reaction, as management pointed to strong order momentum in its Health, Science, and Technology (HST) segment and continued expansion in key verticals like data centers and semiconductors. CEO Eric Ashleman highlighted the company’s ability to leverage its cross-business capabilities, noting, “Our performance pneumatics group is helping customers support data center construction driven by demand from artificial intelligence.” Margin expansion
